name: TheActionistas
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Actionistas: We have grown businesses on and offline to 7 figures and grown teams from 3-200 people. We have swooped into wounded businesses and turned them around very quickly, we have supported business owners and executives to grow something they are proud of. We understand the pains, challenges and cash flow needs and most of all the importance of vision, planning and execution.
